summary: This document is an information report from the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) regarding (fnu) RELOVA, an officer of the Direccion General de Inteligencia (DGI) in Cuba. The report includes details about RELOVA's residences, travels, and activities, gathered from various sources and supplemented by CIA records.
title: (fnu) RELOVA
recipient: STATE, DIA, ARMY, NAVY, NSA, OCR, FBI, REP CINCLANT, CINCSO
